test Package¶

echo_service Module¶

Created on May 22, 2015

@author: paepcke

class kafka_bus_python.test.echo_service.EchoServer[source]¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Producer thread. Can be called with the following characteristics:

o Send a msg once o Before sending any (one or cyclically) more msgs only after method setTrigger() was called. o Send continuous stream of messages at given interval till stop() is called

Message have content msg_n, where n is a rising integer.

ECHO_TOPIC_NAME = 'echo'¶
echoRequestDelivery(topicName, rawResult, msgOffset)[source]¶
run()[source]¶
stop()[source]¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

altDeliverMessage(topicName, rawResult, msgOffset)[source]¶
assertMsgContentReasonable()[source]¶

Checks that a recently received msg has topic self.testTopic, that the payload starts with msg_, and that offset info is an int.

awaitExpectedMsg(timeToWait=5.0)[source]¶

Wait for a message, and return True if the msg arrived within less than 5sec. Else return False

Parameters:timeToWait (float) – how many seconds maximally to wait till concluding that msg won’t arrive

:return boolean indicating whether or not a msg was received within 5sec :rtype: boolean
